16.ara-name: كتاب الديات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Samurah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever kills his slave, then we will kill him, and whoever maims his slave, then we will maim him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يَقْتُلُ عَبْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Who Killed His Slave
